hiveArticle.title: Beautiful Sunday - Cricket Playing
hiveArticle.body:
So today we went to play cricket after a long time. It was a beautiful sunday morning where there was clouds all around. The ground was lush green and have trees all around.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/yaqodumryw.jpg)

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/brqphw9kxi.jpg)

Camera : Nokia 6
